Blizzard


*Blizzard arives at Team Ultima's Base and smiles at Sinister an=
d walks towards the entrance*

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: THEC=
ODE 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Friday, August 04, 2000 9:50 PM
  Su=
bject: Re: NBW


  Airbomber smiles.

  "Good, then maybe we could have som=
e one day." Airbomber said. He kissed Infectra...

  Sinister arives at the=
 Team Ultima Base...
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: iloveallli=
zards 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Friday, August 04, 2000 9:29 P=
M
    Subject: Re: NBW


    Infectra/Blizzard


    Infectra: Yes, I like =
them....Why?

    *Infectra asks Airbomber*



    *Blizzard starts walking=
 faster with Sinister*

      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: THE=
CODE 
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      Sent: Friday, August 04, 2000 5:5=
4 PM
      Subject: Re: NBW


      "Maybe, who knows. We'll grow old toget=
her. Do you like children?" Airbomber asked.

      "Yes! Let's go!" Sinist=
er said. He started walking faster...
        ----- Original Message ----- =

        From: ilovealllizards 
        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
        Sen=
t: Friday, August 04, 2000 5:45 PM
        Subject: Re: NBW


        Blizz=
ard/Infectra

        *Blizzard smiles*

        Blizzard: Okay, let's hurr=
y so we don't miss anything else like maybe a nice battle.

        *Blizza=
rd says to Sinister*



        *Infectra smiles when Airbomber hugs her. S=
he didn't think love could happen so sudden and fast*

        Infectra: Th=
ere are probably tones of Maximals in there going on with lifes pretending =
we're not here.

        *infectra says and than grins*

        Infectra: =
If we wait long enough then we'll get to play in the leaves and snow and th=
an relax in the sun.

        *Infectra says joking wondering when someone =
will notice them*


          ----- Original Message ----- 
          From:=
 THECODE 
          To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
          Sent: Friday, August =
04, 2000 4:48 PM
          Subject: Re: NBW


          "I don't know, let'=
s go back there, now." Sinister said to Blizzard.

          Airbomber watc=
hed Stranato running around and calling out. He laughed.

          "Strana=
to better get some help, otherwise be might become a 'heel' again." Airbomb=
er said. He smiled and hugged Infectra, he never felt this way about a girl=
 before....
            ----- Original Message ----- 
            From: ilo=
vealllizards 
            To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
            Sent: Friday,=
 August 04, 2000 4:38 AM
            Subject: Re: NBW


            Twister=
/Blizzard/Infectra



            *Twister looks at the sword and sighs*

 =
           Twister: I'll have to get used to the fact that, my sister has a=
 life too and I'll have to learn to travel alone....

            *Twister =
sighs and slowly and gentley places the energon eagles into her arm compart=
ment*


            *Blizzard looks at Sinister and smiles*

            Bl=
izzard: I wonder what's happening back at the base.



            *Infectr=
a smiles back at Airbomber*

            Infectra: I trust the both of you.=
.....I did trust the others but....

            *Infectra sighs*

        =
    Infectra: I need to stop thinking of things that upset me. But, it's ha=
rd to thinl of the good times because there were hardly none.

            =
*Infectra says to Airbomber and grins*


              ----- Original Messa=
ge ----- 
              From: THECODE 
              To: nbwrpg@egroups.com=
 
              Sent: Friday, August 04, 2000 4:20 AM
              Subject=
: Re: NBW


              Sinesis frowns. He holds up his brothers sword.

=
              "He left this here, without it, what shall he do? We have sim=
ular problems. I just wish I still had him by my side." Sinesis said to Twi=
ster.

              Sinister held Blizzards hand, illegal fireworks shooti=
ng off in his eyes.

              Stranato calls out.

              "Hey,=
 any Maximals here?" He yells through the base. Airbomber sits down and loo=
ks to Infectra. He smiles.

              "Hopefully, the Maximals will lis=
ten to us, they must know of the occurences happening. I trust Stranato, he=
's always been good. Well, maybe he hasn't always been good, but he's good =
now." Airbomber said to Infectra. He laughed at his words...
              =
  ----- Original Message ----- 
                From: ilovealllizards 
    =
            To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                Sent: Thursday, August =
03, 2000 11:44 PM
                Subject: Re: NBW


                Twiste=
r/Blizzard/Infectra



                *Twister looks at Sinesis*

        =
        Twister: I've decided to let my sister be...For she's my sister and=
 I love her too much to pull her away from the she loves....

             =
   *Twister opens her arm compartment and pulls out a two small pieces of e=
nergon both shaped like an eagle*

                Twister: Our parents gav=
e us both one to unite us as sisters and friends forever and always help ea=
ch other. I found Blizzard's on the ground in front of the base. I doubt sh=
e dropped it by accident.....

                *Twister holds out to Sinesi=
s so he can see*



                (OOC: Ack! I meant The Team Ultima Base=
! My bad, Sorry.)

                *Blizzard skips out of the cave and walk=
s next to Sinister for The Team Ultima Base and holds her hand out wanting =
Sinister to hold her hand*



                *Infectra follows Stranato an=
d Airbomber into the Maximal Base*


                  ----- Original Messa=
ge ----- 
                  From: THECODE 
                  To: nbwrpg@egr=
oups.com 
                  Sent: Thursday, August 03, 2000 6:59 PM
       =
           Subject: Re: NBW


                  Sinesis sighs and stares at=
 Twister. (Sorry about earlier.)

                  Sinister frowns when he=
 sees Blizar walking toward the Maximal base.

                  "Where are=
 you going? And can I come?" Sinister asked.

                  Stranato an=
d Airbomber stop at the Maximal base, since they were never set on enemy an=
d never betrayed the Maximals, they went on in...
                    -----=
 Original Message ----- 
                    From: ilovealllizards 
       =
             To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                    Sent: Thursday, Au=
gust 03, 2000 6:46 PM
                    Subject: Re: NBW


              =
      Infectra/Wrath/Blizzard/Twister


                    *Infectra follo=
ws Stranato and Airbomber towards the Maximal Base*



                    =
*Wrath gets into a CR Chamber when he arives at the Maximal Base awaits his=
 repairs*



                    *Blizzard does a little skip out of the ca=
ve walks next to Sinister for the Maximal Base and holds her hand out towar=
ds his wanting to hold hands with him*



                    (OOC: Twister=
 is out near the Maximal Base but I'm making her come back anyway.)

      =
              *Twister leaves the location of the Maximal Base seeing as ho=
w everyone was else where and went back to Team Ultimas Base and sits at th=
e same table as Sinesis*

                    Twister: I don't know what I'=
m going to do....I end up here thinking I'll find a nice Team where I'm wan=
ted and me and my sister could be sisters and friends...I was such a fool f=
or believing such happiness could happen.....

                    *Twister=
 puts her double sided sword away stares at the table*


                  =
    ----- Original Message ----- 
                      From: THECODE 
    =
                  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                      Sent: Thurs=
day, August 03, 2000 6:27 PM
                      Subject: NBW


         =
             Stranato and Airbomber walked toward the Maximal base.

      =
                Gangon, still dying.

                      Deemos and Inzo=
la confront one another several times, but Inzola always runs from Deemos.
=

                      Etchingar called out to Megatron.

                 =
     "Hey, do I got the job?" He asked.

                      Time Bomb wa=
ited patiently and Land Mine was healed now. Land Mine looked around, looki=
ng to meet Megatron.

                      Sinister came out of the cave (=
Hopefully with Blizzard.) and started back toward Team Ultima's base.

    =
                  Sinesis was healed and sat down next to Twister...






=
